presentationTable.name: Measures
presentationTable.description: This folder contains all the base facts like Revenue, Quantity, Target, Headcount and so on. All the metrics in this folder have the aggregation type as Sum unless explicitly specified.

presentationColumns.name: 1a- Revenue (Orcl Db Tables Only)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:06 - Federated Sources.F0 Revenue Base Measures.1a- Revenue (Orcl Db Tables Only)
presentationColumns.description:
Help :
Revenue data. Sources from Dollars physical column in FactsRev table joining to time using Billed time.  

- Returns sum of data over any selected dimensions
